author: jwross
msg: ARIES-825: Update subsystems to latest Subsystem, Resolver, and Repository APIs.
(1) Replaced synchronous bundle listener with bundle event hook for tracking explicitly installed bundles.
(2) Refactored bundle-to-subsystem relationship tracking to use the event hook even for implicitly installed bundles.
(3) Added environment support for searching only within the same region when working with an osgi.identity requirement.
(4) Moved SubsystemEnvironment to same package as AriesSubsystem for access to package private variables.

author: sf
msg: Fix wrong content type which caused AddOutputFilterByType test failure
